argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualvaddval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualvaddval.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ldualvaddval.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) |
| 4 |  | ldualvaddval.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ldualvaddval.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 6 |  | ldualvaddval.p | |- .+b = ( +g ` D ) |
| 7 |  | ldualvaddval.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 |  | ldualvaddval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 9 |  | ldualvaddval.h | |- ( ph -> H e. F ) |
| 10 |  | ldualvaddval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. V ) |
| 11 | 4, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_ldualvadd | |- ( ph -> ( G .+b H ) = ( G oF .+ H ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( G .+b H ) ` X ) = ( ( G oF .+ H ) ` X ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 14 | 2, 13, 1, 4 | #P_lflf | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> G : V --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( G : V --> ( Base ` R ) -> G Fn V ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ G e. F ) -> G Fn V ) |
| 17 | 7, 8, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> G Fn V ) |
| 18 | 2, 13, 1, 4 | #P_lflf | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ H e. F ) -> H : V --> ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( H : V --> ( Base ` R ) -> H Fn V ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ H e. F ) -> H Fn V ) |
| 21 | 7, 9, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> H Fn V ) |
| 22 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 23 | 1, 22 | #P_eqeltri | |- V e. _V |
| 24 | 23 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> V e. _V ) |
| 25 |  | #P_inidm | |- ( V i^i V ) = V |
| 26 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V ) -> ( G ` X ) = ( G ` X ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V ) -> ( H ` X ) = ( H ` X ) ) |
| 28 | 17, 21, 24, 24, 25, 26, 27 | #P_ofval | |- ( ( ph /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( G oF .+ H ) ` X ) = ( ( G ` X ) .+ ( H ` X ) ) ) |
| 29 | 10, 28 | #P_mpdan | |- ( ph -> ( ( G oF .+ H ) ` X ) = ( ( G ` X ) .+ ( H ` X ) ) ) |
| 30 | 12, 29 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( ( G .+b H ) ` X ) = ( ( G ` X ) .+ ( H ` X ) ) ) |
